tensordb.TensorClient.get_storage¶

TensorClient.get_storage(path: str, definition: Optional[Dict] = None) → tensordb.storages.base_storage.BaseStorage¶

Get the storage of the tensor, by default it try to read the stored definition of the tensor.

Parameters
path: str

Location of your stored tensor.

definition: Optiona[Dict]

Definition for instance the storage, by default this method try to get the definition previously stored for the tensor with the create_tensor method

Returns
A BaseStorage object
tensordb.TensorClient.apply_data_transformation tensordb.TensorClient.read_from_formula
